Package rako_a3.ePortfolio.src

Class Stock

java.lang.Object
rako_a3.ePortfolio.src.Investment
rako_a3.ePortfolio.src.Stock
public class Stock extends Investment
Represents a stock investment. Extends the Investment superclass. Implements specific methods for buying, selling, and calculating gains for stocks. Includes a commission fee for buying and selling.
